history.proof: intros l HwonElection. apply CommonTheorems.wonElection_dedup_spec in HwonElection. auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
vrmutdi: votesReceived_moreUpToDate_interface
rvrmutdi: requestVoteReply_moreUpToDate_interface

Goal:
forall l : list name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l) = true -> exists quorum : list name, NoDup quorum /\ length quorum > div2 (length nodes) /\ (forall h : name, In h quorum -> In h l)

Premises:
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
div2 = fix div2 (a : nat) : nat := match a with | S (S n) => S (div2 n) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments div2 _%nat_scope
wonElection = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (votes : list name) => S (div2 (length nodes)) <=? length votes : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list name -> bool Arguments wonElection {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
nodes = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => all_fin N : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list name Arguments nodes {orig_base_params raft_params}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Record requestVoteReply_moreUpToDate_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_requestVoteReply_moreUpToDate_interface { requestVoteReply_moreUpToDate_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> requestVoteReply_moreUpToDate net } Arguments requestVoteReply_moreUpToDate_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_requestVoteReply_moreUpToDate_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record votesReceived_moreUpToDate_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votesReceived_moreUpToDate_interface { votesReceived_moreUpToDate_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votesReceived_moreUpToDate net } Arguments votesReceived_moreUpToDate_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votesReceived_moreUpToDate_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
dedup : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> list A
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
NoDup : forall A : Type, list A -> Prop
CommonTheorems.wonElection_dedup_spec : forall l : list name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l) = true -> exists quorum : list name, NoDup quorum /\ length quorum > div2 (length nodes) /\ (forall h : name, In h quorum -> In h l)
quorum_preserved : forall (st st' : name -> electionsData * raft_data) (t0 : term) (ll : list entry) (leader : name), (forall (h : name) (t : term) (leader0 : name) (log : list entry), In (t, leader0, log) (votesWithLog (fst (st h))) -> In (t, leader0, log) (votesWithLog (fst (st' h)))) ->...-> exists quorum : list name, NoDup quorum /\ length quorum > div2 (length nodes) /\ (forall h : name, In h quorum -> exists log : list entry, moreUpToDate (maxTerm ll) (maxIndex ll) (maxTerm log) (maxIndex log) = true /\ In (t0, leader, log) (votesWithLog (fst (st' h))))
leaderLogs_votesWithLog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (t : term) (ll : list entry) (leader : Net.name), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) -> exists quorum : list Net.name, NoDup quorum /\ length quorum > div2 (length nodes) /\ (forall h : Net.name, In h quorum -> exists log : list entry, moreUpToDate (maxTerm ll) (maxIndex ll) (maxTerm log) (maxIndex log) = true /\ In (t, leader, log) (votesWithLog (fst (nwState net h)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_votesWithLog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
CommonTheorems.wonElection_one_in_common : forall l l' : list name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l) = true -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l') = true -> exists h : name, In h l /\ In h l'
CommonTheorems.wonElection_exists_voter : forall l : list name, wonElection l = true -> exists x : name, In x l
pigeon : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l sub1 sub2 : list A, (forall a : A, In a sub1 -> In a l) -> (forall a : A, In a sub2 -> In a l) -> NoDup l -> NoDup sub1 -> NoDup sub2 -> length sub1 + length sub2 > length l -> exists a : A, In a sub1 /\ In a sub2
CommonTheorems.wonElection_no_dup_in : forall l1 l2 : list name, wonElection l1 = true -> NoDup l1 -> (forall x : name, In x l1 -> In x l2) -> wonElection l2 = true
handleRequestVoteReply_spec' : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> (type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true) /\ r = true /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ currentTerm st = t /\ votesReceived st' = h' :: votesReceived st)
handleRequestVoteReply_spec : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' <> Candidate) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true)
CommonTheorems.wonElection_length : forall l1 l2 : list name, wonElection l1 = true -> length l1 <= length l2 -> wonElection l2 = true
haveQuorum = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : raft_data) (_ : name) (N : logIndex) => div2 (length nodes) <? length (filter (fun h : name => N <=? assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex state) h 0) nodes) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), raft_data -> name -> logIndex -> bool Arguments haveQuorum {orig_base_params raft_params}
